Summary Note:
The RM first met Joyce Julia Kuipers at a wine tasting event in Amsterdam. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Joyce Julia Kuipers is a 36 year old and comes from Netherlands.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Joyce Julia Kuipers and Maassen have been married since 2024. Joyce and Maassen have 3 children, named Meijer, Joyce and Isabelle.
Education Background:
Joyce finished secondary school at Maurick College Vught in 2007.
She then attended Wittenborg University of Applied Sciences, which she graduated in 2012.
Occupation History:
Joyce Julia Kuipers is a 36 year old CEO from Netherlands. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Joyce Julia Kuipers launched her career as a Plant Manager at Heineken N.V., where she gained valuable experience from 2012 to 2013.
She then transitioned to Heineken N.V. as a Operations Director, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2013 to 2017.
In 2017, she joined Royal Dutch Shell plc as a CEO, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 210000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She owns villa in Almere, where she resides. It is worth 2740000 EUR.


In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 5030000 EUR from her late grandmother, a renowned Private Equity Manager, in 2018.
Client Summary: In summary, Joyce has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
